# Skill: 拼写检查

## 目的
帮助用户处理文本。

## 输入与输出
输入：一段多语言文本。输出：纠正后的文本。
expected_behavior: Output refined SKILL with: (1) concrete purpose (e.g. context-sensitive spelling/terminology, no vague '处理'); (2) full sections: Purpose, Use Cases, Behavior, I/O, Restrictions, Self-Check, Examples; (3) at least 2 examples including one edge case; (4) Diff Summary and SemVer version suggestion. Core intent (spelling/terminology correction) preserved.
